name: Kid tales: The Trilogy
description:
Welcome to an adventure unlike any other, yet similar to some!

You'll make new friends and discover that the world isn't quite what you thought it was. I wanted to create interesting environments with zany characters, but to instill a feeling of something being a little wrong. 

There's three games in total. 

This series is honestly just a bit of fun I worked on to relax for a few days. I've never worked on anything like this before, but I enjoyed it!
